name: the Garden (itch) (shoze)
description:
Made during procjam 2020.

How to play:

------------------------------------------------------------

Use the shovel tool to dig holes

Use the bug cards to plant seeds. Each bug type grow different flowers.

Switch between sun and rain cards to make the flowers grow.

Use the shears tool to trim your flowers and dead stems.

Credits:
